verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> unto Jacob ק֛וּם <WH6965> Arise עֲלֵ֥ה <WH5927> go up בֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> to Bethel וְשֶׁב־ <WH3427> and dwell שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> there and make שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> there an altar לָאֵל֙ <WH410> unto God הַנִּרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> that appeared אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you בְּבָרְחֲךָ֔ <WH1272> unto thee when thou fleddest מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the face עֵשָׂ֥ו <WH6215> of Esau אָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> thy brother

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> Then Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> unto his household וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with הָסִ֜רוּ <WH5493> and to all that [were] with him Put away אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <WH5236> the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּתֹכְכֶ֔ם <WH8432> that [are] among you וְהִֽטַּהֲר֔וּ <WH2891> and be clean וְהַחֲלִ֖יפוּ <WH2498> and change שִׂמְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8071> your garments

וְנָק֥וּמָה <WH6965> And let us arise וְנַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> and go up בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> to Bethel וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and I will make שָּׁ֣ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> there an altar לָאֵ֞ל <WH410> unto God הָעֹנֶ֤ה <WH6030> who answered אֹתִי֙ <WH853> בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> me in the day צָֽרָתִ֔י <WH6869> of my distress וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> been עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> against בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> and was with me in the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I הָלָֽכְתִּי׃ <WH1980> which I went

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> And they gave אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> unto Jacob אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <WH5236> all the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּיָדָ֔ם <WH3027> which [were] in their hand וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּזָמִ֖ים <WH5141> and [all their] earrings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH241> which [were] in their ears וַיִּטְמֹ֤ן <WH2934> hid אֹתָם֙ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> and Jacob תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הָאֵלָ֖ה <WH424> them under the oak אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עִם־ <WH5973> was near שְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7927> which [was] by Shechem

וַיִּסָּ֑עוּ <WH5265> And they journeyed וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become חִתַּ֣ת <WH2847> and the terror אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God עַל־ <WH5921> upon הֶֽעָרִים֙ <WH5892> was upon the cities אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> that [were] round about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not רָֽדְפ֔וּ <WH7291> them and they did not pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> So Jacob ל֗וּזָה <WH3870> to Luz אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan הִ֖וא <WH1931> he בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> that [is] Bethel ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> he and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> And he built שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> there an altar וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and called לַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> the place אֵ֖ל <WH410> God בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> Beth-el כִּ֣י <WH3588> because שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there נִגְל֤וּ <WH1540> appeared אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> because there God בְּבָרְח֖וֹ <WH1272> unto him when he fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from the face אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> of his brother

וַתָּ֤מָת <WH4191> died דְּבֹרָה֙ <WH1683> But Deborah מֵינֶ֣קֶת <WH3243> nurse רִבְקָ֔ה <WH7259> Rebekah's וַתִּקָּבֵ֛ר <WH6912> and she was buried מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under לְבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> beneath Bethel תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הָֽאַלּ֑וֹן <WH437> under an oak וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> of it was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> and the name אַלּ֥וֹן בָּכֽוּת׃ <WH439> Allonbachuth פ

וַיֵּרָ֨א <WH7200> appeared אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> And God אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> unto Jacob ע֔וֹד <WH5750> again בְּבֹא֖וֹ <WH935> again when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <WH6307> out of Padanaram וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <WH1288> and blessed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> unto him Thy name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> [is] Jacob לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall no יִקָּרֵא֩ <WH7121> shall not be called שִׁמְךָ֨ <WH8034> thy name ע֜וֹד <WH5750> longer יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> any more Jacob כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> but Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> to him שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> shall be thy name וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and he called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ל֨וֹ אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I am אֵ֤ל <WH410> unto him I [am] God שַׁדַּי֙ <WH7706> Almighty פְּרֵ֣ה <WH6509> be fruitful וּרְבֵ֔ה <WH7235> and multiply גּ֛וֹי <WH1471> a nation וּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> and a company גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of nations יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall come מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> at וּמְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> shall be of thee and kings מֵחֲלָצֶ֥יךָ <WH2504> out of thy loins יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> shall come

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> And the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֛תִּי <WH5414> which I gave לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> Abraham וּלְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> and Isaac לְךָ֣ אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <WH5414> to thee I will give it וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <WH2233> and to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> after thee אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> will I give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land
וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up מֵעָלָ֖יו <WH5921> Then אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> And God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> from him in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> where he talked אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וַיַּצֵּ֨ב <WH5324> set up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob מַצֵּבָ֗ה <WH4676> a pillar בַּמָּק֛וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> where he talked אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> with מַצֶּ֣בֶת <WH4678> with him [even] a pillar אָ֑בֶן <WH68> of stone וַיַּסֵּ֤ךְ <WH5258> and he poured עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> out נֶ֔סֶךְ <WH5262> a drink offering וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> thereon and he poured עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> oil

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> of the place אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> spake אִתּ֥וֹ <WH854> for שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> where God בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> with him Bethel

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> And they journeyed מִבֵּ֣ית אֵ֔ל <WH1008> from Bethel וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> there was ע֥וֹד <WH5750> and there was but כִּבְרַת־ <WH3530> a little הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> way לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to come אֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH672> to Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> travailed רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> and Rachel וַתְּקַ֥שׁ <WH7185> and she had hard בְּלִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3205> labour

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> was in בְהַקְשֹׁתָ֖הּ <WH7185> And it came to pass when she was in hard בְּלִדְתָּ֑הּ <WH3205> labour וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said לָ֤הּ הַמְיַלֶּ֙דֶת֙ <WH3205> that the midwife אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <WH3372> unto her Fear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גַם־ <WH1571> again זֶ֥ה <WH2088> he לָ֖ךְ בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> not thou shalt have this son

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came בְּצֵ֤את <WH3318> was in departing נַפְשָׁהּ֙ <WH5315> And it came to pass as her soul כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֔תָה <WH4191> (for she died וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> ) that she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name בֶּן־ אוֹנִ֑י <WH1126> Benoni וְאָבִ֖יו <WH1> but his father קָֽרָא־ <WH7121> called ל֥וֹ בִנְיָמִֽין׃ <WH1144> him Benjamin

וַתָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died רָחֵ֑ל <WH7354> And Rachel וַתִּקָּבֵר֙ <WH6912> and was buried בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way אֶפְרָ֔תָה <WH672> to Ephrath הִ֖וא <WH1931> he בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> which [is] Bethlehem

וַיַּצֵּ֧ב <WH5324> set יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> And Jacob מַצֵּבָ֖ה <WH4676> a pillar עַל־ <WH5921> over קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <WH6900> upon her grave הִ֛וא <WH1931> he מַצֶּ֥בֶת <WH4678> that [is] the pillar קְבֻרַֽת־ <WH6900> grave רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> of Rachel's עַד־ <WH5704> to this הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> unto this day
וַיִּסַּ֖ע <WH5265> journeyed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> And Israel וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> and spread אָֽהֳלֹ֔ה <WH168> his tent מֵהָ֖לְאָה <WH1973> beyond לְמִגְדַּל־ עֵֽדֶר׃ <WH4029> of Edar

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּשְׁכֹּ֤ן <WH7931> dwelt יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And it came to pass when Israel בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in that land הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> that Reuben וַיִּשְׁכַּ֕ב֙ <WH7901> and lay אֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְהָ֖ה֙ <WH1090> with Bilhah פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ <WH6370> concubine אָבִ֑֔יו <WH1> his father's וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> heard יִשְׂרָאֵֽ֑ל <WH3478> and Israel פ וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> [it] Now the sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> of Leah בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> firstborn יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob's רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> Reuben וְשִׁמְעוֹן֙ <WH8095> and Simeon וְלֵוִ֣י <WH3878> and Levi וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and Judah וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> and Issachar וּזְבוּלֻֽן׃ <WH2074> and Zebulun
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> of Rachel יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> and Benjamin
וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> And the sons בִלְהָה֙ <WH1090> of Bilhah שִׁפְחַ֣ת <WH8198> handmaid רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> Rachel's דָּ֖ן <WH1835> Dan וְנַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <WH5321> and Naphtali

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons זִלְפָּ֛ה <WH2153> of Zilpah שִׁפְחַ֥ת <WH8198> handmaid לֵאָ֖ה <WH3812> Leah's גָּ֣ד <WH1410> Gad וְאָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> and Asher אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> these [are] the sons יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> which were born ל֖וֹ בְּפַדַּ֥ן אֲרָֽם׃ <WH6307> to him in Padanaram

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> unto Isaac אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father מַמְרֵ֖א <WH4471> unto Mamre קִרְיַ֣ת הָֽאַרְבַּ֑ע <WH7153> unto the city of Arbah הִ֣וא <WH1931> he חֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> which [is] Hebron אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after גָּֽר־ <WH1481> sojourned שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> in it אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> where Abraham וְיִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> and Isaac
וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> And the days יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> of Isaac מְאַ֥ת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּגְוַ֨ע <WH1478> gave up the ghost יִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> And Isaac וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <WH4191> and died וַיֵּאָ֣סֶף <WH622> and was gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמָּ֔יו <WH5971> unto his people זָקֵ֖ן <WH2205> [being] old וּשְׂבַ֣ע <WH7649> and full יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> of days וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <WH6912> buried אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עֵשָׂ֥ו <WH6215> Esau וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and Jacob בָּנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> and his sons פ
